description.value:
You listen to what the shapes of stone and straw have to say, learning what recently transpired nearby.

Alternative Reward: Fey Magic Gift - Uncommon

Power âœ¦ Daily (Minor Action)

Effect: For the next 10 minutes, you can speak with statues, scarecrows, and other objects that look like creatures. They animate only enough to speak, and they display moderate intelligence. You can question them and learn what has transpired within the last 24 hours in their immediate surroundings. Their knowledge includes only things that would be obvious to normal senses. For instance, they would know that a horseman passed by an hour ago, but they would not know that an invisible creature sneaked past.
